rows.label: qev051404_MSG0001
rows.name: I am glad to see we both survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0002
rows.name:
You have done much for us.
I cannot adequately express my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0003
rows.name:
Were it not for your skill, this place might be under
Ganglion control right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0004
rows.name:
I fear we were lax in bracing for a Ganglion attack.
We let the distance from here to Sylvalum make us
complacent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0005
rows.name:
In that respect, your stealing those plans has taught us
even more than we expected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0006
rows.name:
An in-depth analysis of the schematics should allow us
to learn even more of the Ganglion's technology and
strategy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0007
rows.name:
But I swear now to destroy them once that information
has been extracted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0008
rows.name:
We had no intention of deigning to use Ganglion
weapons from the outset, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0009
rows.name:
But you have done much for us, and I did not want
you to be plagued by needless worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0010
rows.name: Again, allow me to thank you for your assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051404_MSG0011
rows.name:
In return, I reaffirm the Wrothian's promise to offer
humankind our unstinting aid in the struggle to defeat
the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]
